name: muddle
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 an untidy or confused state: The documents were in a muddle. Whenever I go to Europe I get in a muddle about/over (= become confused about) how much things cost. Synonym
fuddle informal

a messy and confused state: Her life was in a muddle.
